name: Quest For ROYGBIV
description:
Please remember this is my first game and it won't be the best

Installation (simple)

Download the zip file 

Extract the file

Make sure the .dll and the game stay in the same folder

Double click on the Unity file and play!

How to play

Follow the spotlights to get to that color

Go to the block to score the point

Find all 7 colors of the rainbow (ROYGBIV) to win!

Controls

WASD to move

Alt + F4 to exit

Feel free to comment any game ideas or advice!
